A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was not even a Star Wars film\, it was a Disney toy commercial for the Christmas season\, and a lousy one at that. It did not even try to tell a cohesive story or build upon what came before\, it simply bombarded the audience with flashing lights and explosions and marked off Social Justice check boxes for a couple hours. If you have an inkling of fondness for the Star Wars franchise\, do not waste your time or money with this film.
